text: Kevin Barrett is a game designer who has worked primarily on role-playing games. ==Career== Kevin Barrett collaborated with Terry K. Amthor in the creation of Spacemaster (1985), the science-fiction version of Rolemaster, which also had a second edition in 1988. The first miniatures game from Iron Crown Enterprises was Barrett's Silent Death (1990), which initially used the Spacemaster background. By 1992, Barrett had left ICE. He later worked as writer at BioWare. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:Role-playing game designers Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Kevin Barrett (game designer)
